title: Countries Under the Most Strain in the European Migration Crisis
body: Germany has received the most asylum applications among countries in the European Union, with more than 314,000 applicants from January to October, up from 136,000 in the same period last year. Comparable monthly data is currently only available through October. Serbia and Kosovo, when adjusted for population are the top recipients, with more than 5,000 applications per 100,000 people.
